Class ManageCustomerOrdersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mangeCustomerOrders.ManageCustomerOrdersController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ManageCustomerOrdersController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    ManageCustomerOrdersController used as a controller for the manager order view screen operated by the ManageCustomerOrders FXML file
    Author:
    Eitan

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void approveCancelRequest​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      cancels an order that was already in accepted and was requested by the customer to be canceled
      (package private) void approveOrder​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      approves a new order - changes status to Approved
      private java.lang.Double calculateRefund​(ManagerOrderView mov)
      used to calculate the refund a customer is eligible by the time of cancellation compared to the time of the delivery
      (package private) void cancelOrder​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      if the store manager does not like the order placed by the customer he can cancel it and the customer will be rfunded accordingly
      (package private) void denyCancelRequest​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      if the manager decides to not approve an order cancellation the order returns to status awaiting delivery
      private void displayError​(int n)
      displays error message for n seconds
      void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      used to initialize the tables for the store manager to be able to approve and cancel orders
      (package private) void returnHome​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      returns user to home screen
